descriptions: This place was obviously designed by a {{adj}} fool.
A well thought out design full of {{adj}} people.
If you were to print a postcard of this {{adj}} place, the recipient would cry {{adj}} tears.
It smells like someone lit a {{adj}} dumpster and pushed into a {{adj}} orphanage.
If I were a betting person, they'd call me {{adj}} for even considering this place
I once dated a {{adj}} person. I wouldn't take them here.
I'm sure this place was {{adj}} at one time. Now it's obviously home to your mother.
This place will be celebrated for it's {{adj}} vistas.
You'd have to be {{adj}} to want to live here.
Your heart sings {{adj}} songs at the mere thought of this place.
I {{adj}} this place! How ever did you discover it?
You can't throw a stone around here without hitting a {{adj}} beast.
